title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, August 17, 2021
description: “…the physical body, so to speak, of poetry, is the treatment by which the poet tries to reconcile that pain with the world." –Ted Kooser, born on this day in 1930.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “…the physical body, so to speak, of poetry, is the treatment by which the poet tries to reconcile that pain with the world." –Ted Kooser, born on this day in 1930.
